dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication This white paper is one part of a three part series developed in collaboration with Pfizer which is devoted to exploring the use of mHealth to advance healthy aging in low and middle income countries This paper focuses specifically on the use of mHealth to support caregivers of aging individuals Oct 2013
